amendment.description: To provide for a report concerning how Federal funds are expended relating to Hansen's Disease.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1569 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1569 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324; text as modified: CR 9/11/2003 S11321) To provide for a report concerning how Federal funds are expended relating to Hansen's Disease.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1569 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1569 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 1542.
